lines.value: para matulungan ang mga manlalaro nila mula sa sa pagka kabigo ang lupon ay kumuha ng isang dating all star at los angeles native dennis johnson na nagkamit ng tatlong nba championships sa seattle noong 1979 at sa boston noong 1984 and 1986 bilang isang assistant coach

lines.value: ang clippers ay kuntento na sa mga season na nilaruan nila pero nanalo lamang ng 3 laban sa 13 na laro at nagtala ng rekord na 39-43 sa ika 5 laro natanggal sila sa huling playoff

lines.value: ang 2002 offseason ay nagdala ng maraming pagbabago dahil si miles ay pinalit nila sa cavaliers kapalit ng point guard na si andre miller na naguna sa nba sa pagpasa noong 2001-02 na may 11 assist kada laro

lines.value: it was the 20th of february 1865 when a group of ilocano settlers in wooden carts and horsebacks arrived at a vast forested plain northwest of the binituan river in nueva ecija
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: they cleared the land and started planting the loamy soil with the rice seeds they brought with them
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: they called the new land san juan de guimba in honor of the patron saint the settlers brought from ilocos and of the pot making industry called gebba which they used to do in the old land
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: thus was the origin of guimba and its rice industry as it rose to become the province of nueva ecija's traditional top rice producing area
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: soon more settlers arrived mostly from the old towns of bacarra paoay and candon of the ilocos provinces
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: among the families who came were the galapons mateos cudals padres cayogs romanos silvestres capinpuyans batangans faigals sumawangs and catabonas
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: what would be the town of guimba is a relatively organized community when the spanish colonialists arrived and appointed don luis de ocampo as the first gobernadorcillo
lines.name: Tagalog

lines.value: the spanish left and the americans came and in 1912 the town's name was abbreviated to guimba with don alfonso faigal as the first alcalde mayor

lines.value: st john the evangelist though remains to be its patron saint
